Encoding_API.summary: The Encoding API enables web developers to work with text that is represented in character encoding systems other than the encoding used internally by JavaScript strings. In particular, it enables developers to convert text between JavaScript strings and the UTF-8 encoding that is used for most documents on the web.

remarks.para: Note that these operations are asymmetrical: encoding only encodes to UTF-8, while decoding can decode UTF-8 but also many legacy encoding systems.

The API provides synchronous interfaces for encoding and decoding, and also stream-based encoders and decoders, which could be used to, for example, decode text as it arrives over a network connection.
-Encoding API Encodings - Encodings that must be supported for decoding text.
